trends: There have been no other sightings in Eastover
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was just inducted into the Army. Was at Ft. Jackson It was about 2200 hr. We were standing outside waiting to be assigned our sleeping quarters for the night. I was looking up at the stars when all of a sudden one of them took off in what appeared to be an acending zig-zag pattern. First it went to the left then right and to the left and disapeared. The whole thing only lasted about 3 seconds. It has been 46 years and I can't forget the night. Have no idea what I saw that night. I would like to know if ther were any other reports from that time or of that nature. thank you Frank Sykes
Summary: Looking at stars and one of them took off in an acending zig-zag pattern
